title: TIP-1 Salaries for team members
body:
Author: d3vnull

Summary:
Provide a monthly salary for full time team members & hire of a new full time solidity developer. This salary will be paid on a monthly basis.
For:
Ravage - 8000$ (in DSD)
Gus - 8000$ (in DSD)
Acv_ - 3000$ (in DSD)
Block_muncher - 1500$ (in DSD)

Motivation:
The Dynamic Set Protocol can only be as good as the team & the community behind it. Within the past months, we established a team of highly committed people that are essential for us, and the success of DSD.

To adequately meet the team members’ contributions and honor their excellent input, 100s of hours of hard work and the responsibility they carry, a fair salary is mandatory. This will not just reflect tasks that have been achieved in the past, but also tasks that will be relevant in the future, such as forming additional partnerships & integrations, creating detailed documentations, writing Medium articles, running the newsletter

Ravage - Head of Integrations & Partnerships / Community Lead
	> Secured collaborations with Sushiswap, OpenDAO , MantraDAO & 
           crv.finance
	> Formal proposals to 15 additional protocols and is currently in talks 
           with platforms, e.g. AAVE, Notional.finance, Perpetual Protocol, Cream.
	> Community moderation (European time zone)

Gus - Full stack / Solidity Developer
	> Implementation of DIPs
	> Focus on DIP-10
	> Provide technical infrastructure for future integrations, e.g. Sushiswap
	Note: As Gus joined mid-January, only half a salary will be paid.

Acv_ & Block_muncher - Business Development / Community Moderation
	> Creation of several written content pieces
	> Community moderation (US & Asian time zone)

Specification:
Once the TIP has been approved, the total funding amount will be sent to the following address (0x9cB564Bde1DCb69b887D3FCE19dBbF0DFb20Ed82), and distributed to the following team members above.
choices: No, salaries should not be paid
author: 0xF414CFf71eCC35320Df0BB577E3Bc9B69c9E1f07
